price: 我在你们的上面确已造了七条轨道，我对众生，不是疏忽的。
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلۡخَلۡقِ غَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā fawqakum sabʿa ṭarāiqa wamā kunnā ʿani al-khalqi ghāfilīna
